title: Jamie Dimon says he still sees a recession on the horizon
content: Dimon, leader of the biggest U.S. bank by assets and one of the most respected voices on Wall Street, has warned of an economic "hurricane" since 2022.
summary: Dimon, leader of the biggest U.S. bank by assets and one of the most respected voices on Wall Street, has warned of an economic "hurricane" since 2022.

title: No sign of U.S. recession in freight demand, CEO of shipping giant Maersk says
content: U.S. inventories "are not at a level that is worrisome or that seems to indicate a significant slowdown right in the offing."
summary: U.S. inventories "are not at a level that is worrisome or that seems to indicate a significant slowdown right in the offing."

title: As inflation fury lingers, politicians join customers in pushing companies to cut prices
content: Companies like Kroger, Walmart and McDonald's are getting caught in the political messaging around inflation ahead of the 2024 election.
summary: Companies like Kroger, Walmart and McDonald's are getting caught in the political messaging around inflation ahead of the 2024 election.

title: Hamas' new political leader Yahya Sinwar is seen as more extreme — and less willing to compromise
content: Haniyeh's killing has led to a much more hard-line leader for Hamas, likely dealing a severe blow to chances of a cease-fire.
summary: Haniyeh's killing has led to a much more hard-line leader for Hamas, likely dealing a severe blow to chances of a cease-fire.

title: In a reversal, Disney's media assets are starting to generate more excitement than its parks
content: For the first time in more than two years, Disney's media assets are outshining the parks division.
summary: For the first time in more than two years, Disney's media assets are outshining the parks division.

title: Russia hates on the Olympic Games, relishing 'scandals' and controversy in Paris
content: Russia's media has shunned coverage of the Olympic Games in Paris — unless something has been controversial or gone wrong.
summary: Russia's media has shunned coverage of the Olympic Games in Paris — unless something has been controversial or gone wrong.

title: Putin accuses Ukraine of 'large-scale provocation' at the Russian border
content: Russia President Vladimir Putin accused Ukraine on Wednesday of carrying out what he called "yet another large-scale provocation" at the Russian border.
summary: Russia President Vladimir Putin accused Ukraine on Wednesday of carrying out what he called "yet another large-scale provocation" at the Russian border.

title: Sony rules out renewing offer for Paramount, says it wouldn't fit strategy
content: Hiroki Totoki, Sony's chief financial officer, said the tech giant has no plans to submit a revised offer for Paramount.
summary: Hiroki Totoki, Sony's chief financial officer, said the tech giant has no plans to submit a revised offer for Paramount.

title: Google's antitrust ruling has experts looking to 25-year-old Microsoft case for answers
content: The historic antitrust case against Microsoft in 1999 provides some clues as to what Google can expect after Monday's ruling.
summary: The historic antitrust case against Microsoft in 1999 provides some clues as to what Google can expect after Monday's ruling.

title: Elon Musk slammed by British government after comments on UK riots
content: The U.K. government hit back at Elon Musk after the billionaire made controversial comments about far-right riots taking place across the country.
summary: The U.K. government hit back at Elon Musk after the billionaire made controversial comments about far-right riots taking place across the country.

title: Elon Musk ‘accountable to no one,’ UK tech minister says amid disinformation during riots
content: Elon Musk can't be held to account by anyone, the U.K.'s technology minister said, adding to criticisms of the billionaire from government officials.
summary: Elon Musk can't be held to account by anyone, the U.K.'s technology minister said, adding to criticisms of the billionaire from government officials.

title: Disney beats estimates as combined streaming services turn a profit
content: Disney beat estimates as its combined streaming businesses — Disney+, Hulu and ESPN+ — turned a profit for the first time.
summary: Disney beat estimates as its combined streaming businesses — Disney+, Hulu and ESPN+ — turned a profit for the first time.

title: Novo Nordisk shares dip as Wegovy maker posts earnings miss, cuts operating profit outlook
content: Novo Nordisk on Wednesday announced its second quarter earnings for 2024.
summary: Novo Nordisk on Wednesday announced its second quarter earnings for 2024.

title: SoftBank swings back to gains at Vision Fund tech arm, announces up to $3.4 billion share buyback
content: SoftBank announced it would buy back up to 6.8% of shares available amounting to up to 500 billion yen ($3.4 billion).
summary: SoftBank announced it would buy back up to 6.8% of shares available amounting to up to 500 billion yen ($3.4 billion).

title: China's exports miss expectations in July, while imports pick up with growth of 7.2%
content: China's imports grew faster-than-expected in July, while export growth came in below forecasts, according to customs data released Wednesday.
summary: China's imports grew faster-than-expected in July, while export growth came in below forecasts, according to customs data released Wednesday.

title: Consumer giants from Starbucks to General Mills have one big sales problem: China
content: A theme emerging in the latest slew of U.S. companies' earnings reports is a drag from the China market.
summary: A theme emerging in the latest slew of U.S. companies' earnings reports is a drag from the China market.

title: Beyonce, PlayStation games help Sony post a 10% jump in profits
content: Sony reported a 10% jump in operating profit in the fiscal first quarter, beating analyst expectations.
summary: Sony reported a 10% jump in operating profit in the fiscal first quarter, beating analyst expectations.

title: Sahm Rule creator doesn't think that the Fed needs an emergency rate cut
content: She said, however, there is a good case for a 50 basis point cut, adding that the Fed needs to "back off" its restrictive monetary policy.
summary: She said, however, there is a good case for a 50 basis point cut, adding that the Fed needs to "back off" its restrictive monetary policy.

title: The popular 'carry trade' is unwinding — and economists fear Fed rate cuts could make matters worse
content: The warning comes as market participants seek to aggressively roll back on carry trades following a dramatic global sell-off in risk assets.
summary: The warning comes as market participants seek to aggressively roll back on carry trades following a dramatic global sell-off in risk assets.

title: Correction in the dollar-yen was overdue and may be 'healthy' for markets, former ECB chief says
content: "Everybody knew that the yen was not in an appropriate position," Jean-Claude Trichet told CNBC.
summary: "Everybody knew that the yen was not in an appropriate position," Jean-Claude Trichet told CNBC.

title: As riots and disorder spread, some countries warn their citizens about traveling to the UK
content: Five countries have issued travel and safety warnings to their citizens living or visiting the U.K. as riots and street disorder continue to plague the country.
summary: Five countries have issued travel and safety warnings to their citizens living or visiting the U.K. as riots and street disorder continue to plague the country.

title: China launches its rival to Elon Musk's Starlink internet satellites
content: By 2025, China is aiming to deploy 648 satellites of the "Thousand Sails Constellation" to create global internet coverage, according to state media CCTV.
summary: By 2025, China is aiming to deploy 648 satellites of the "Thousand Sails Constellation" to create global internet coverage, according to state media CCTV.

title: An airline now allows women to avoid sitting next to men. Here's how travelers are reacting
content: Indian airline IndiGo is trialing a booking feature that allows women to see the genders of passengers when they book their seats, the company said.
summary: Indian airline IndiGo is trialing a booking feature that allows women to see the genders of passengers when they book their seats, the company said.

title: CNBC Daily Open: Market correction may not be over yet
content: Dow snaps three-day losing streak. Super Micro sinks on earnings miss. X sues advertisers.

title: Harris and Walz make Trump focus at Democratic ticket's first rally
content: Kamala Harris and Tim Walz are up against the Republican ticket of Donald Trump and Sen. JD Vance.
summary: Kamala Harris and Tim Walz are up against the Republican ticket of Donald Trump and Sen. JD Vance.

title: Airbnb shares drop 14% on earnings miss as company warns of slowing U.S. demand
content: Airbnb shares dropped 14% in after-hours trading after the company reported second-quarter earnings that missed analyst expectations.
summary: Airbnb shares dropped 14% in after-hours trading after the company reported second-quarter earnings that missed analyst expectations.

title: Super Micro announces 10-for-1 stock split, shares plunge 13% on earnings miss
content: Super Micro announced a 10-for-1 stock split and issued upbeat guidance for the first quarter.
summary: Super Micro announced a 10-for-1 stock split and issued upbeat guidance for the first quarter.

title: Microsoft fires back at Delta after massive outage, says airline declined 'repeated' offers for help
content: Microsoft said Delta turned down several offers for help during the flight disruptions following the outage.
summary: Microsoft said Delta turned down several offers for help during the flight disruptions following the outage.

title: UNESCO uses emergency procedure to name Gaza site to both its ‘World Heritage’ and ‘In Danger’ lists
content: The decision to inscribe the Saint Hilarion Monastery/Tell Umm Amer to both lists reflects the site's inherent value and need for protection, UNESCO said.
summary: The decision to inscribe the Saint Hilarion Monastery/Tell Umm Amer to both lists reflects the site's inherent value and need for protection, UNESCO said.

title: Trump possible target of Pakistani national charged in murder-for-hire plot
content: Asif Merchant was arrested in the murder-for-hire case a day before a gunman narrowly missed killing Donald Trump at a campaign rally in Pennsylvania.
summary: Asif Merchant was arrested in the murder-for-hire case a day before a gunman narrowly missed killing Donald Trump at a campaign rally in Pennsylvania.
